name: A Pilfering Pucks Problem
description:
The goblins stole your bow and hid all the pieces. You need your violin to get the big goblin out of the way of the special door.

Find the bow, body, neck, and the four strings of your violin, then go through the special door and see what's there.

This game was drawn and put together by Patrick Lauser. Sound effects were edited from public domain sounds from freesound.org, and a few recorded by me.

The violin music was from the third movement of St. Paul's Suite by Holst, played by Arianna Cunningham.

I hope this little game pleases you! I have a few other games you might like as well.

Your servant,
Patrick
